When Itinerant Trader enters the battlefield, you may exile three cards from a single graveyard. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.
Homestead {2}{W} [i]({2}{W}: Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery. Cast it on a later turn by tapping untapped creatures you control with total power greater than or equal to its mana value.)[/i]
